topics.name: Views on Marriage Roles and Responsibilities

subtopics.name: Pace of Life and Energy Levels
Expectations of Marriage and the Future

questions.question_text: Which statement best describes your relationship with Islam right now?
options: Islam guides almost all my decisions
Islam is very important, but I struggle with consistency
Islam is important, but not central to my daily life
Islam is mainly cultural or identity-based

questions.question_text: How do you feel about where you are religiously at this stage of life?
If you feel unsettled religiously, what best explains why?
How often do you pray the five daily prayers?
If you miss prayers, what is the most common reason?
options: I do not prioritise them currently

questions.question_text: How important is regular prayer in a spouse?
How do you currently engage with the Qur’an?
What role should the Qur’an play in your household?
How do you view spiritual growth within marriage?
options: Not something I have considered deeply

questions.question_text: Do you actively try to improve your religious practice?
What most motivates your spiritual growth?
Would you marry someone more practising than you?
How important is halal income to you?
Would you leave an income source if it was clearly haram?
How do you approach modesty in dress and behaviour?
options: I do not think much about it

questions.question_text: How important is modesty in a spouse?
How do you approach gender interaction boundaries?
How do you currently seek Islamic knowledge?
How important is ongoing Islamic learning after marriage?
Would you like to attend Islamic learning with your spouse?
How connected do you feel to your local Muslim community?
How important is raising a family in a visibly Muslim environment?
Would you prioritise living near a mosque?
What role should a spouse play in your religious practice?
How would you feel if your spouse reminded you of Islamic obligations?
Should marriage make practising Islam easier?
Which religious differences would be difficult to accept? (Select all)
Which religious practices are non-negotiable for you? (Select all)
How do you feel about differing madhhab or scholarly opinions?
If a religious disagreement occurred, how should it be resolved?
When you feel loved, what is usually happening? (Select all)
options: I feel cared for through actions

questions.question_text: How often do you need emotional check-ins?
When struggling emotionally, what do you want most?
What responses feel most harmful when you are upset? (Select all)
When stressed, what is your natural response?
How long do you usually need before discussing stress calmly?
How often do you reflect on your behaviour after conflict?
How comfortable are you apologising first?
When something bothers you, what do you usually do?
What communication style feels best from a spouse?
How do you prefer to resolve misunderstandings?
How affectionate are you naturally?
Which forms of affection feel most natural? (Select all)
How often do you need reassurance?
Which best describes your temperament?
How social are you?
How do you prefer to recharge?
What triggers you most in conflict? (Select all)
What matters most in conflict?
What helps repair after conflict? (Select all)
How open are you to feedback from a spouse?
When wrong, what is your usual pattern?
Which description feels closest to how you actually live most days?
Which parts of your routine are non-negotiable? (Select all)
How do you prefer weekday evenings?
How much time together do you expect on a normal weekday?
What makes time together feel meaningful to you most?
How social are you in your lifestyle?
How often do you expect to see friends or extended family?
How important is it that your spouse joins you in social activities?
How would you describe your relationship with work or career?
options: Mainly a means to support life

questions.question_text: How many hours a week do you realistically expect to work long-term?
If you expect 50+ hours, how do you plan to protect time for marriage/family?
options: Intentional quality time even if limited
I am unsure how I would manage this

questions.question_text: How do you feel about a spouse being more career-driven than you?
Which best describes your spending style?
What lifestyle matters more to you?
What would you consider “overspending” in marriage?
options: Any spending that creates debt or instability
It depends on income and context

questions.question_text: Where do you ideally see yourself living after marriage?
How important is staying close to your current city or country?
How open are you to relocating for your spouse?
If you are reluctant/not open, what would make relocation possible? (Select all)
Which pace of life suits you best?
How do you usually feel at the end of most days?
What helps you reset when life feels overwhelming? (Select all)
How do you feel about long-term planning?
options: I like clear plans and timelines
I prefer loose plans with flexibility

questions.question_text: How do you approach big life decisions most often?
What kind of decision-maker do you want your spouse to be?
How important is travel to you?
What kind of trips do you enjoy most?
How often would you ideally like to travel as a couple?
How do you handle major life changes?
Are you currently in a period of transition?
If yes/somewhat, how do you expect this to affect marriage?
options: It will add stress and require patience
It will require planning and structure
It will not affect marriage significantly

questions.question_text: What does a “successful life” look like to you most?
In ten years, what do you hope daily life looks like most?
What sacrifices are you willing to make for marriage? (Select all)
What lifestyle differences would be difficult to live with? (Select all)
Where are you most flexible, and where are you least flexible?
options: I am flexible in most areas
I am flexible socially, less flexible financially
I am flexible financially, less flexible socially
I am flexible on location, less flexible on lifestyle

questions.question_text: Which statement best reflects how you view roles in marriage?
options: Clearly defined roles based on responsibility
Shared roles with flexibility based on circumstances
Mostly shared roles without fixed structure
I am still figuring this out

questions.question_text: What does your ideal role look like day-to-day?
What should your spouse’s ideal role look like day-to-day?
What is the primary purpose of marriage (in your view)?
Which matters most to you personally?
How do you understand leadership within marriage?
How should major decisions be made?
options: Jointly, but one has final responsibility

questions.question_text: Which decisions require joint agreement no matter what? (Select all)
How comfortable are you taking responsibility for difficult decisions?
How do you view household responsibilities?
How important is it that household work feels fair?
What would “unfair” look like to you?
options: One person doing most chores consistently
One person not contributing at all

questions.question_text: How do you feel about hiring help if affordable?
How important is personal independence within marriage?
What does healthy independence look like to you? (Select all)
How much autonomy do you expect in personal decisions?
How do you feel about compromising in marriage?
When there is disagreement, who should adjust more often?
options: Whoever is more capable in that situation

questions.question_text: Are there areas you believe you should not have to compromise? (Select all)
How willing are you to explain your non-compromise areas calmly?
How much have culture/upbringing shaped your expectations of roles?
Are you open to adjusting those expectations?
When traditional expectations clash with practical realities, what happens?
What behaviours make you feel respected? (Select all)
What behaviours feel disrespectful? (Select all)
When respect is damaged, how should it be repaired?
What example do you want to set regarding roles?
How important is it children see cooperation between parents?
Which role assumptions do you think are commonly misunderstood? (Select all)
Are there role-related expectations that are non-negotiable for you?
How central is your family in your life right now?
How are you most involved with your family? (Select all)
How do you expect this to change after marriage?
How much influence do your parents have over major life decisions now?
How should this change after marriage?
Where does parental input matter most?
If parents disagreed with a decision you and spouse made, what would you do?
Expectations for living arrangements after marriage?
If living with parents is expected, what boundaries are essential? (Select all)
How important is living physically close to family?
How do you view your role toward spouse’s parents?
What does your spouse owe your parents?
How comfortable are you with frequent contact between spouse and their family?
What feels like “too much” involvement?
How important is privacy between spouses?
What should remain private from family? (Select all)
How would you feel if a family member regularly commented on your marriage?
How should this be handled?
options: Boundary through spouse (their family, their role)

questions.question_text: If conflict arose between spouse and your family, who should address it?
How important is it your spouse feels protected from family conflict?
Would you set firm boundaries with your family if needed?
If difficult/no, why is it challenging?
options: I do not believe boundaries are needed

questions.question_text: How much does culture influence family involvement expectations?
Are you comfortable challenging cultural expectations if harmful?
Which in-law cultural expectations concern you most? (Select all)
How involved are siblings/extended relatives in your life?
How much involvement from extended family feels healthy?
After marriage, who should come first in decision-making?
What does “putting your spouse first” mean most?
options: Making key decisions jointly with spouse

questions.question_text: If spouse felt hurt by something your family did, what would you do first?
If family expectations conflicted with spouse’s wellbeing, what takes priority?
What family-related situations would be difficult long-term? (Select all)
Any non-negotiables around in-laws?
Do you want children?
Ideal number of children?
Preference for children’s gender?
How soon after marriage would you hope for children?
If children were delayed, how would you feel?
If you answered “No”, why not?
Do you expect your view could change?
If your spouse later strongly wanted children, how would you respond?
If you answered “Open”, which is closest?
options: I actively want children one day
I would be content without children
I would accept if Allah gave them unexpectedly

questions.question_text: Would you feel fulfilled in marriage without children?
Would you accommodate your spouse’s preferences if different?
If “Unsure”, what best explains uncertainty?
Do you expect clarity before marriage?
What would help you gain clarity?
Would your family pressure you to have children after marriage?
If pressured, would it make you have children sooner?
Which values matter most to instil? (Rank 1–6)
Your instinctive parenting style?
Importance of raising children with strong Islamic foundations?
How do you feel about discipline?
How should discipline decisions be made?
If spouse’s discipline style differed, how would you feel?
Views on physical discipline?
options: Only very mild (e.g., light slap on wrist)

questions.question_text: How should childcare be shared?
Adjusting your career for children?
If one parent stayed home temporarily, who should it be?
How patient are you with children?
When exhausted/overwhelmed, what happens?
What support would you need from a spouse? (Select all)
How open are you to discussing fertility challenges?
If biological children were not possible, what alternatives are you open to? (Select all)
If fertility issue came from you, what stance fits best?
options: I would not end the marriage for this
I would discuss options deeply before deciding
I would consider separation to allow spouse children

questions.question_text: If fertility issue came from your spouse, what stance fits best?
options: I would not end the marriage for this
I would discuss options deeply before deciding
I would consider separation to allow children

questions.question_text: If relevant Islamically, stance on polygyny as a solution?
options: Acceptable only if both agree genuinely

questions.question_text: Environment you want children raised in?
Importance of raising children near family?
Comfort with family influencing parenting decisions?
Who should have final say on parenting?
Desired relationship with children as adults?
Parenting mistakes you most want to avoid? (Select all)
Parenting views that would be deal-breakers? (Select all)
Fears about becoming a parent? (Select all)
What would make you feel confident and supported as a parent? (Select all)
How do you generally feel about conflict in close relationships?
options: Dislike it but deal with it

questions.question_text: What is hardest about conflict for you?
When disagreement starts, first instinct?
When emotions rise in an argument, what happens?
What helps you calm down enough to continue? (Select all)
Awareness of tone/words during conflict?
Have you said things you regretted in conflict?
How do you usually repair after saying something harmful?
options: Apologise after time to cool down
Prefer to move on without discussing

questions.question_text: How much space do you need during conflict?
What does “too much space” look like?
Continuing daily interaction while conflict is unresolved?
When you feel misunderstood, what do you do?
How do you prefer spouse raises concerns?
options: In private, not in the moment

questions.question_text: Which behaviours affect you negatively in conflict? (Select all)
Preferred alternative from spouse?
How easy is it for you to admit fault?
What makes an apology feel genuine? (Select all)
After conflict, what helps reconnect most?
Time needed to reset emotionally after conflict?
What escalates conflict for you? (Select all)
When conflict escalates, what is your pattern?
Sensitive topics for you? (Select all)
What makes sensitive topics safer to discuss?
How do you feel about silence during conflict?
Have you used silence to protect yourself?
Healthy way to pause a conflict?
Involving a third party when conflict is stuck?
Who would you trust most?
How often do you reflect on your own role after conflict?
What have past conflicts taught you most?
If spouse raised the same issue repeatedly, what would it signal?
options: It is truly important to them

questions.question_text: If conflict kept repeating, what would you do first?
Unacceptable conflict behaviours in marriage? (Select all)
How should boundaries be enforced if those occur?
How important is it that conflict strengthens the marriage long-term?
How do you view money most?
How did upbringing influence this view?
Comfort discussing money with partner currently?
Comfort discussing money when married?
What do you expect to contribute financially when married? (Select all)
What do you expect your partner to contribute financially? (Select all)
Importance that you personally contribute financially?
Who would you prefer to be the higher earner?
How would you feel if spouse earned significantly more?
If spouse could not fulfil financial obligations, what would you do?
If you could not fulfil financial obligations, what do you expect from spouse?
options: Minimal expectation; I would solve it

questions.question_text: Do you expect spouse to work when married?
Spending style?
Budgeting approach?
What matters more in daily life?
How should money be stored?
Importance of financial transparency?
Information that should always be shared? (Select all)
Spending level that requires discussion?
Who should have final say on significant financial decisions?
How do you feel about debt?
Do you currently have debt?
Approach to managing debt?
How do you feel about financial risk?
Open to interest-based loans?
Response to financial stress?
How handle financial disagreements?
Stressful money behaviours in spouse? (Select all)
Willingness to adjust lifestyle for stability?
If finances tight, first cut-back?
Importance of giving (zakat/sadaqah/family support)?
Intended portion of income to give?
How should giving decisions be made?
Expect spouse to disclose all charitable deeds?
Importance of long-term financial planning?
Financial goals that matter most? (Select all)
Willing to help with a significant purchase even if not responsible for payment?
Financial deal-breakers? (Select all)
Financial fears entering marriage? (Select all)
Importance of health in daily life?
What does “taking care of health” look like? (Select all)
Energy levels most days?
Physical activity intention?
Importance of healthy household lifestyle?
When tired/run down, how do you treat your body?
Comfort talking about emotional/mental health?
Support that helps most during those times? (Select all)
Coping with prolonged stress?
When unwell/low, what do you expect from spouse?
Comfort caring for spouse during illness/difficulty?
How should responsibilities shift if one spouse struggles?
options: Maintain roles as much as possible

questions.question_text: Awareness of personal limits?
When close to burnout, response?
Signs spouse should look for? (Select all)
Openness to self-reflection and change?
Have you intentionally worked through personal challenges before?
Have you experienced trauma?
Willingness to elaborate on difficult experiences?
options: Share only with trust over time

questions.question_text: How do you feel about professional help if needed?
Who would you seek support from? (Select all)
How do you view personal growth after marriage?
How should spouses support growth?
Areas you are most focused on improving now? (Select all)
Discipline with habits?
How do you build new habits?
If marriage enters a difficult season, what would you need most?
What would make you feel unsupported? (Select all)
What does a healthy life together look like?
Health/well-being expectations that are non-negotiable?
Anything spouse should understand about your needs/capacity early?
Current understanding of the menstrual cycle?
Importance for a husband to understand his wife’s cycle?
Why do you feel that way?
options: I do not think it matters much

questions.question_text: Openness to learning how hormones affect mood/energy?
options: When someone is more sensitive/irritable than usual, your instinct:

questions.question_text: Comfort offering support even without fully understanding?
Willingness to adjust expectations when wife not feeling well?
Support that matters most during physically uncomfortable days? (Select all)
Willing to provide different support types across different stages of cycle?
Importance of avoiding calling emotional reactions “overreacting”?
How should intimacy be approached when wife low energy/uncomfortable?
Importance of respecting privacy while being supportive?
Understanding Islamic rulings around menstruation and marital interaction?
Comfort with Islamic rulings?
Intention to follow Islamic rulings?
Do you view learning wife’s cycle as part of ihsān in marriage?
If disagreement happens during difficult time, what should happen?
Importance of separating temporary emotional states from deeper issues?
Do you believe lack of empathy here could harm marriage long-term?
Comfort talking to spouse about your cycle/effects?
What makes these conversations easier/harder?
How long is your menstrual cycle?
Side effects you experience across cycle? (Select all)
What would you want from husband to help with side effects? (Select all)
Importance husband understands how cycle affects you?
Realistic expectation of husband’s understanding?
During difficult days, what support matters most? (Select all)
options: Most supportive response from husband during those times:

questions.question_text: When you are low/tired, what do you hope husband does not assume? (Select all)
options: There is a serious relationship problem

questions.question_text: Importance husband does not dismiss feelings as exaggerated?
How should intimacy be handled during low-energy/uncomfortable days?
Comfort approaching husband for intimacy generally?
Comfort saying “not today” without guilt?
Understanding Islamic rulings around menstruation and marital interaction?
Comfort with Islamic rulings?
Intention to follow Islamic rulings?
Willingness for other halal intimacy (not intercourse) during menstruation?
Importance of privacy around physical/emotional state?
What would feel intrusive/uncomfortable? (Select all)
options: Using it against me in conflict

questions.question_text: If disagreement arises during difficult time, preference?
What helps you feel safe enough to communicate then? (Select all)
Openness to educating husband about changes?
Importance learning and adjustment go both ways?
options: Belief that being understood here affects marital happiness:

questions.question_text: What would make you feel deeply supported in this area?
